pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering and PCA with Weights, and Data Nuggets Clustering // K-means clustering, hierarchical clustering, and PCA with observational weights and/or variable weights. It also includes the corresponding functions for data nuggets which serve as representative samples of large datasets. Cherasia et al., (2022) doi:10.1007/978-3-031-22687-8_20. Amaratunga et al., (2009) doi:10.1002/9780470317129.
